required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study for PD-1 Antibody JS001 in MSI-H Advanced or Recurrent Colorectal Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: An Exploratory Study for PD-1 Antibody JS001 in Participants With Microsatellite Instability-high (MSI-H) Advanced or Recurrent Colorectal Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: To observe the efficacy of PD-1 antibody JS001 in the treatment of participants with microsatellite instability-high (MSI-H) advanced or recurrent colorectal cancer, so as to provide sufficient evidence for MSI-H as a biomarker of PD-1/PD-L1 inhibitor.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 12 Weeks from the drug firstly being taken
primary_outcome.description: The 12 week objective response will be measured according to RECIST v1.1

responsible_party.investigator_title: Deputy director of the colorectal cancer center
